message.content:
cs.GT, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.EC, cs.LG

The paper discusses mechanism design in auctions for information goods, which falls under the category of game theory (cs.GT). It specifically focuses on sponsored search auctions (cs.IR) and online ad-exchanges, which involve the allocation of digital goods and the optimization of revenue/efficiency (cs.EC). The paper also mentions the use of linear programming to identify optimal probability distributions, which is a common technique in optimization and algorithms research (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses potential future directions for research, which could fall under the category of machine learning (cs.LG).
